General.Name: Buana Finance Tbk
General.Description: PT Buana Finance Tbk provides investment, consumer, working capital, and multipurpose financing services in Indonesia. The company operates through Finance Lease Receivables and Consumer Financing Receivables segments. It offers financing services for various products, including heavy equipment, such as excavators, wheel loaders, tractors, and heavy trucks; generator and forklifts; printing and industrial machineries; consumer cars and commercial vehicles (trucks); vessels; Hajj/Umrah; education; tour traveling/vacation; and others, as well as sale and leaseback services. The company also provides working capital financing, which include factoring; multipurpose financing comprising finance lease and installment finance; and investment financing that cover financing facilities for procurement of capital goods, as well as services to individuals, business entities, or legal entities for the modernization and expansion of businesses/investment. It serves customers through a network of 33 branches located in Jabodetabek, Java, Sumatera, Bali, Kalimantan, and Sulawesi. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Buana Finance Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sari Dasa Karsa.
